title: Creating an Inequality
text: First, we must transfer the word problem into an inequality that represents the number of tablets (n) Dawn can buy.

title: Creating an Inequality
text: We know that $254.12*(the number of tablets) is no more than $4,000. So, we can create the inequality $$254.12n \leq 4000$$

title: Solving the Inequality
text: Now we must solve the inequality by isolating n.

title: Solving the Inequality
text: To do this, we need to divide both sides by 254.12. Now, we have $$n \leq 15.74$$ as our inequality.

title: Solving the Inequality
text: Since the number of tablets can only be a whole number, we must round the inequality. Now, we have $$n \leq 15$$.

title: Creating a Sentence-Answer
text: Since n must be less than or equal to 15, what is the maximum number of tablets that Dawn can buy?
